Articles.Content:
Bwarg ! I can't cope with this !

...

Hello,

Can anyone tell me how to approve comments that were posted on my blog ? I'm sure I'm missing something obvious, but well, I didn't find.

As a regular paranoid and (averagely effective) tidy-up maniac, I had the "Moderate comments before displaying" box checked in my *Permissions & Privacy* settings.

I noticed today I had a few comments submitted here and there since early June... (my apologies to the people who posted these nice comments.)

So where's the "approve comment" button ? : )

Thanks for your forthcoming answer.

Hi Plume & Akakak, the option to allow members to moderate their own blog is disabled, sorry, please feel free to notify a moderator when you need comments moderated, or use the report button to notify all moderators currently online ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I manually approved all the comments I could find there. You should consider turning that option off in your settings, it's pretty tedious for us to do.
